replies.author: 乙烯_中国
replies.txt_content:
标题: Minecraft 16w40a 发布 本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 18:17 编辑 

每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。

然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。
适用于正式版的MOD不兼容预览版，而且大多数MOD都不提供对每周快照的支持。
Minecraft 1.11 仍未发布，16w40a为其第9个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。



It’s time for a charming bug fix snapshot!
是时候发布一个魅人的修复bug的快照了！
And this snapshot includes…
此快照含有
Notable changes:
显著的更新
Fixed bugs introduced in the previous snapshot
修复之前的bug
Added bugs to fix in next snapshot
添加之后修复的bug

Bugs fixed in 16w40a:

[Bug MC-3352] - Arrows fired into a repeater / comparator / jukebox / command block / hopper / daylight sensor that is updating will play the arrow hitting a block noise
箭射中比较器、中继器、音符盒、命令方块、漏斗、日光传感器后，每当这些方块更新就会产生一次声音
[Bug MC-4132] - Piston placement issue past 16777217
过远的活塞工作不正常
[Bug MC-67665] - Mouse click position always lags a few frames behind the crosshair
鼠标点击的位置总是比准星位置慢几帧
[Bug MC-89030] - Pistons warp entities too much (Pistons pull entities in/through blocks)
活塞过推实体
[Bug MC-98093] - Distorted Pistons
扭曲的活塞
[Bug MC-106706] - Renamed brewing stand does not drop after being placed
命名过的酿造台放置后破坏时不会掉落物品
[Bug MC-106765] - Silverfish not moving when mobGriefing is false
在mobGriefing 是false事蠹虫不动
[Bug MC-106826] - Can interact(eat) with cake in creative mode/hunger bar is full
创造模式或饥饿值满时可以和蛋糕交互
[Bug MC-106905] - Rabbits jump extra high on farmland and fence related blocks.
兔子在栅栏类方块或者耕地上跳的特高
[Bug MC-107168] - Weather changes to clear after sleeping with doWeatherCycle set to false
doWeatherCycle设为false时睡觉后会将天气设为晴
[Bug MC-107378] - Unable to shift-click items into non-full brewing stand ingredient slot
无法通过Shift+点击物品来将其放入酿造台的原料槽中
[Bug MC-107403] - No subtitles for Shulker Box / Llama
潜影箱和羊驼没有字幕
[Bug MC-107674] - Evocators & Vindicator do not display custom head item or held items
Evocator和Vindicator不显示自定义头部物品或持有的物品
[Bug MC-107891] - Vindicator axes are not damaged
Vindicator掉落的斧子耐久值是满的
[Bug MC-107929] - Typo: “Light Grey Shulker Box”
拼写错误：“Light Grey Shulker Box”
[Bug MC-107937] - Renamed shulker boxes got unnamed when placed by a dispenser
命名过的潜影箱被发射器放置时名字消失
[Bug MC-107941] - Shooting an arrow and reloading the world gives potion particles.
射出箭并重新载入世界会产生药水粒子
[Bug MC-107946] - Entities fall through Shulker Boxes when opened
实体在潜影箱打开时掉下箱子
[Bug MC-107954] - Camera shakes when open shulker box you standing on
站在潜影箱上开箱镜头摇晃
[Bug MC-107998] - Animals not running away when on fire
动物着火时不逃跑
[Bug MC-108021] - Some mobs float above horses when riding them
有些生物骑马时会浮在马上
[Bug MC-108029] - Strange Texture Behavior of End Portal Block
末地传送门方块的材质行为异常
[Bug MC-108055] - Leash Knot can’t be broken sometimes
栓绳有时不能被破坏
[Bug MC-108079] - Crash when trading or picking up filled map with invalid data value from furnace
当交易或拾取熔炉中的带非法数据值的地图时崩溃
[Bug MC-108084] - When in Creative’s “Survival Inventory”, dropping an item will not delete item from hand
在创造模式的“生存模式物品栏”中扔出物品不会从物品栏中移除它
[Bug MC-108085] - Vindicators and mobs with axes don’t disable shields.
Vindicator和有斧子的生物不会破坏盾牌
[Bug MC-108105] - Llamas in caravan unable to be tamed
商队中的羊驼无法被驯服
[Bug MC-108123] - {CanPickUpLoot:1b} Vindicators don’t use their better weapon
带有{CanPickUpLoot:1b}的Vindicator不会使用它们的更好的武器
[Bug MC-108188] - Spectral arrows not being shot by skeletons
闪灵箭无法由骷髅射出
[Bug MC-108225] - Cannot leash multiple mobs to same fence when not holding lead item
没有持有栓绳物品时无法将多于一只的生物栓到同一格栅栏上
[Bug MC-108271] - Unable to untie more than one Lllama from a fence
无法从栅栏上解绑多于一只羊驼







Please report any and all bugs you find in Minecraft to bugs.mojang.com. If nobody reports a bug, we can’t fix it!
请在http://bugs.mojang.com报告Minecraft中的BUG。如果没人汇报BUG的话，我们无法修复它！

To get snapshots, open your launcher and press the “New Profile” button. Call it “snapshots” and check the box saying “Enable experimental development snapshots” and save. To switch to the normal version, you can select it in the dropdown at the bottom left corner of the launcher. Back up your world first or run the game on in a different folder (See the “new profile” dialog).
如果你想试玩快照，请打开官方启动器并点击“New Profile”按钮，选中“snapshots”并选择“Enable experimental development snapshots”并点击保存。如果想切换到普通的版本，你可以在启动器左下角按钮上方的下拉菜单中选择。在开始快照前备份你的世界或在不同的文件夹中启动快照（见“new profile”对话框）。

Snapshots can corrupt your world, please backup and/or run them in a different folder from your main worlds.
快照可能会玩坏你的存档，请千万记得备份存档和/或在与你的存档不同文件夹里运行。




跨平台服务器Jar：
http://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/16w39c/minecraft_server.16w39c.jar


正版启动器下载地址Windowshttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.exeMac/OSXhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.dmgLinux/Otherhttp://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/launcher/Minecraft.jar
关于本次更新的详细内容，请关注稍后 http://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/1.11 的更新。
预览版的下载方式以及运行说明对于正版用户官方启动器是跟进最及时、运行最稳定的启动器，每次启动均会自动检查并下载启动器最新版本。启动器在上文已经提供。适用于全PC平台。对于非正版用户非正版用户完全可以体验预览版本，请于推荐启动器列表寻找合适的启动器。如有仍疑惑请到原版问答板块提问。
关注最新版本资讯，请关注mcbbs新闻版 Minecraft官方版本信息索引（自正式版1.0.0至今）与版规
外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪
Mojang官方博客（英文）Jeb的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Dinnerbone的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Grum的Twitter（英文，内地需**）TheMogMiner的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Searge的Twitter（英文，内地需**）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）英语 Minecraft Wiki的Version history页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细，很慢）
